Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Heart Container#.
